title: Tender Italian Baked Chicken
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Watch Now

In a bowl, mix the mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, and garlic powder. Place bread crumbs in a separate bowl. Dip chicken into the mayonnaise mixture, then into the bread crumbs to coat. Arrange coated chicken on a baking sheet. Watch Now
Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken juices run clear and coating is golden brown. Watch Now
